column4: Tell me about your most challenging customer. How did you resolve their issues and make them satisfied?
column5: Describe a time when you had to make a decision without having all the data or information you needed.
column6: Which Amazon leadership principle resonates with you most?
column7: Can you give me an example of a time when you exceeded expectations?
column8: Can you describe a time when you took the lead on a project?

column4: Tell me about how you work with difficult people.

column6: Do you prefer working in small or large teams?
column7: Define your ideal work environment and manager.
column8: Tell me about a time you had to resolve a conflict in a team.
column9: Why do you want to work for Google?
